items.sentence: I really want to spend some time alone with Tom.
I have to go shopping. I\'ll be back in an hour.
I haven\'t checked my messages yet this morning.
I haven\'t read the final page of the novel yet.
Mary asked if the cat had drunk all of the milk.
Please forgive me for not having written sooner.
Please tell me which bus to take to go downtown.
Tell your son not to harass my daughter anymore.
Ten policemen were assigned to patrol that area.
Thanks to your help, I was able to finish early.
It never occurred to me that Tom wouldn\'t come.
It wouldn\'t surprise me if Tom didn\'t show up.
It\'s a secret. You can\'t let anyone else know.
That\'s one of the things that I like about Tom.
Tom thought of the many ways he could kill Mary.
Tom thought that Mary might try to kill herself.
Tom thought that Mary was having money problems.
Tom thought that Mary was likely to get the job.
Tom thought that Mary would do that right thing.
I\'m going to take a bath as soon as I get home.
